Class Automaton

  • java.lang.Object
    • Automaton
  • public class Automaton
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the actual Automaton that will implement almost all other classes in the program
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Arjun Ganesan

    • Constructor Detail

      • Automaton

        public Automaton​(Rule rule,
                 Generation init,
                 BoundaryConditions bc)
        Parameters:
        rule - is the Rule that the Automaton will be following
        init - is the initial Generation of the Automaton holding no EvolvedCells
        bc - is the BoundaryConditions that the Automaton will be following
